{"locale":"zh-cn","title":{"default":"No.6 High School of Xiamen, Fujian (Tong'an Campus) Rhythm Game Department | Group Entry Questionnaire | V0.0.0 Test Version","zh-cn":"福建省厦门第六中学 (同安校区) 音游部 | 入群问卷 | V0.0.0 测试版"},"description":{"default":"Welcome to the Rhythm Game Club of No.6 High School of Xiamen, Fujian (Tong'an Campus)! Before you join, please take a moment to fill out this questionnaire.
The entry threshold for this Rhythm Game Club is very low. The questionnaire review system is only to prevent the emergence of rhythm game kings and casual players, as well as to understand the situation of the group members. We welcome all rhythm game enthusiasts to join!
-
Questionnaire version number: V0.0.0 | This version is for testing purposes only.","zh-cn":"欢迎加入福建省厦门第六中学(同安校区)音游部！在您加入之前，麻烦您拨冗填写这张问卷。
本音游部入群门槛非常低，问卷审核制度只是为了防止音游王和云玩家的出现以及对群员情况的了解。欢迎各位音游人们加入！
-
问卷版本号: V0.0.0 | 该版本仅供测试"},"pages":[{"name":"0","title":{"zh-cn":"Part 0 | 条款与规定","default":"Part 0 | Terms and Conditions"},"elements":[{"type":"boolean","name":"Policy","title":{"default":"Have you read, understood, and agreed to the “福建省厦门第六中学(同安校区)音游部 管理公约” and the "福建省厦门第六中学(同安校区)音游部 审核问卷须知"?","zh-cn":"您是否已经阅读了解并同意《福建省厦门第六中学(同安校区)音游部 管理公约》、《福建省厦门第六中学(同安校区)音游部 审核问卷须知》？"},"description":{"default":"You must read and agree to the above terms, provide information, and meet the conditions required by the above terms in order to apply for membership.

If the QQ number provided below is not the one you used to join the rhythm game department QQ group, please contact the administrator."},"defaultValueExpression":"{Specific_QQId}","readOnly":true}]},{"name":"2","title":{"default":"Part 2 | Survey on Music Game Literacy","zh-cn":"Part 2 | 音乐游戏素养调查"},"description":{"zh-cn":"| 下方内容请尽可能的避免查询Wiki、网络资料等信息，按照经验如实填写即可。
| 由于音游圈成分的复杂性，下方得分并不是很影响您入群的几率。","default":"| Please avoid querying Wiki, online materials, and other information as much as possible for the content below; fill it out truthfully based on your experience.
| Due to the complexity of the rhythm game community, the scores below do not significantly affect your chances of joining the group."},"elements":[{"type":"checkbox","name":"RhythmGameDeviceStyle","title":{"zh-cn":"您接触过的音乐游戏种类？","default":"What types of music games have you been exposed to?"},"description":{"zh-cn":"接触指实际意义上的上手玩过，下同。可以多选。","default":""Contact" refers to having actually played hands-on in a practical sense, and the same applies below. Multiple selections are allowed."},"choices":[{"value":"Arcade","text":{"zh-cn":"街机类音游","default":"Arcade-style rhythm games"}},{"value":"Mobile","text":{"zh-cn":"移动端音游","default":"Mobile rhythm game"}},{"value":"Desktop","text":{"zh-cn":"桌面端音游","default":"Desktop rhythm game"}},{"value":"Handheld","text":{"zh-cn":"掌机端音游","default":"Handheld music game"}},{"value":"Host-side","text":{"zh-cn":"主机端音游","default":"Host-side rhythm game"}},{"value":"VR","text":{"zh-cn":"VR终端类音游","default":"VR terminal music games"}}],"showOtherItem":true,"otherText":{"zh-cn":"填写其他答案","default":"Other"}},{"type":"checkbox","name":"RhythmGameStyle","title":{"zh-cn":"请在下方勾选出您擅长/喜爱的音乐游戏玩法种类。","default":"Please check the types of music game gameplay that you are good at or enjoy below."},"description":{"zh-cn":"可能包含重叠要素，可以多选。","default":"May contain overlapping elements and allows multiple selections."},"isRequired":true,"choices":[{"value":"Item 1","text":{"zh-cn":"偶像类音游","default":"Idol-themed rhythm games"}},{"value":"Item 2","text":{"zh-cn":"下落式音游","default":"Falling-style rhythm game"}},{"value":"Item 3","text":{"zh-cn":"剧情向音游","default":"Story-driven rhythm game"}},{"value":"Item 4","text":{"zh-cn":"跳舞机(?)式音游","default":"Dance machine-style (?) rhythm game"}},{"value":"Item 5","text":{"zh-cn":"类音游","default":"Rhythm-game-liked game"}},{"value":"Item 6","text":{"zh-cn":"从内向外填充式音游","default":"Inward-outward filling rhythm game"}}],"showOtherItem":true},{"type":"checkbox","name":"RhythmGameSelect","title":{"zh-cn":"请在下方勾选您曾经/现在接触过的音乐游戏。","default":"Please check the music games you have ever/currently been in contact with below."},"description":{"zh-cn":"以下音乐游戏列表多为按字母排序。居于列表较上的为移动端 音游，较下的为街机端/其他 种类音游。不包含饭制音游客户端，街机音游按照厂牌系列分组排序。

部分游戏名后半部分为官方中译或社区惯用名。

由于篇幅限制，无法列举太多音游，请见谅。","default":"The following list of music games is mostly sorted alphabetically. The games listed at the top are mobile music games, while those lower down are arcade or other types of music games. It does not include fan-made music game clients, and arcade music games are grouped and sorted by brand series.

The latter part of some game titles is the official Chinese translation or commonly used names in the community.

Due to space limitations, it is not possible to list too many music games; please understand."},"isRequired":true,"choices":[{"value":"Item 4","text":{"zh-cn":"A Dance of Fire and Ice | 冰与火之舞","default":"A Dance of Fire and Ice"}},{"value":"Item 5","text":{"zh-cn":"Arcaea | 韵律源点","default":"Arcaea"}},{"value":"Item 6","text":{"zh-cn":"BanG Dream! 少女乐团派对! | 邦邦","default":"BanG Dream!"}},{"value":"Item 7","text":{"zh-cn":"Beatmania IIDX Ultimate Mobile"}},{"value":"Item 8","text":{"zh-cn":"ChainBeeT"}},{"value":"Item 9","text":{"zh-cn":"Cytus (II) | 音乐世界赛特斯","default":"Cytus (II)"}},{"value":"Item 10","text":{"zh-cn":"DanceRail3 | DR3"}},{"value":"Item 11","text":{"zh-cn":"Deemo (II) | 古树旋律 | 花雨旋律","default":"Deemo (II)"}},{"value":"Item 12","text":{"zh-cn":"Dynamix | 炫光动感","default":"Dynamix"}},{"value":"Item 13","text":{"zh-cn":"D4DJ Groovy Mix"}},{"value":"Item 14","text":{"zh-cn":"Groove Coaster 2"}},{"value":"Item 15","text":{"zh-cn":"Jubeat"}},{"value":"Item 16","text":{"zh-cn":"节奏大师 | Rhythm Master","default":"Rhythm Master"}},{"value":"Item 17","text":{"zh-cn":"Kalpa"}},{"value":"Item 18","text":{"zh-cn":"Lanota | 调律诗篇","default":"Lanota"}},{"value":"Item 19","text":{"zh-cn":"Lethe"}},{"value":"Item 20","text":{"zh-cn":"Love Live! SIF2"}},{"value":"Item 21","text":{"zh-cn":"Malody (V)"}},{"value":"Item MD","text":{"default":"Muse Dash","zh-cn":"Muse Dash | 喵斯快跑"}},{"value":"Item 22","text":{"zh-cn":"Orzmic"}},{"value":"Item 23","text":{"zh-cn":"OSU! 如您不愿意透露该值，请填0.00。","default":"This value has little impact on your approval; it is for investigation purposes only, so please fill it out truthfully."},"isRequired":true,"inputType":"number","step":0.01},{"type":"text","name":"PgrRKS","visibleIf":"{RhythmGameSelect} contains 'Item 26'","title":{"zh-cn":"请输入您的 Phigros RKS 值。","default":"Please enter your Phigros RKS value."},"description":{"zh-cn":"该值对您通过审核的影响不大，仅作调查用，请如实填写。
如您不愿意透露该值，请填0.00。","default":"This value has little impact on your approval; it is for investigation purposes only, so please fill it out truthfully."},"isRequired":true,"inputType":"number","step":0.01},{"type":"text","name":"maimaiRAT","visibleIf":"{RhythmGameSelect} contains 'Item 44'","title":{"zh-cn":"请输入您 舞萌DX 的 DX Rating 值。","default":"Please enter your DX Rating value for maimai DX."},"description":{"zh-cn":"该值对您通过审核的影响不大，仅作调查用，请如实填写。
如您不愿意透露该值，请填0.00。","default":"This value has little impact on your approval; it is for investigation purposes only, so please fill it out truthfully."},"isRequired":true,"inputType":"number","step":100},{"type":"text","name":"MDLV","visibleIf":"{RhythmGameSelect} contains 'Item MD'","title":{"zh-cn":"请输入您的 Muse Dash Level 值。","default":"Please enter your Level of  Muse Dash."},"description":{"zh-cn":"该值对您通过审核的影响不大，仅作调查用，请如实填写。
如您不愿意透露该值，请填0.00。","default":"This value has little impact on your approval; it is for investigation purposes only, so please fill it out truthfully."},"isRequired":true,"inputType":"number","step":50},{"type":"comment","name":"OtherPTT","title":{"zh-cn":"请在下方填写您其它音游的潜力值或其他能代表您该游戏水平的指标。","default":"Please fill in the potential value of your other rhythm games or other indicators that can represent your level in the game below."},"description":{"zh-cn":"如果您已经在前几题中填写了某些音游的潜力值，您则不必在此填写那些音游的潜力值。

"音游潜力值"指大多数音乐游戏中，具有的反馈玩家当前实力的一个可变化数值指标。
例如Arcaea的PTT(潜力值)、Phigros的RKS(Ranking Score)、Muse Dash的Level或者舞萌(maimai)的DX Rating。
部分音乐游戏没有一个量化的类似指标，您可以填写其它可以反映您该游戏水平的一次成绩、通关曲目等等。

可以换行，请在指标前注明游戏或其可辩别的别名，例如
"范式 170.1000
BanG Dream 365
DEEMO II 300"...","default":"If you have already filled in the potential values for certain rhythm games in the previous questions, you do not need to fill in those potential values here.

"Rhythm game potential value" refers to a variable numerical indicator that reflects the player's current skill level in most music games.
For example, Arcaea's PTT (Potential Value), Phigros' RKS (Ranking Score), Muse Dash's Level, or maimai's DX Rating.
Some music games do not have a quantifiable similar indicator; you can fill in other achievements, completed tracks, etc., that can reflect your level in that game.

You can break the line, please indicate the game or its recognizable alias before the indicator, for example
"Paradigm Reboot 170.1000
BanG Dream 365
DEEMO II 300"..."},"requiredIf":"{RhythmGameSelect} notcontains 'Item 5' and {RhythmGameSelect} notcontains 'Item 26' and {RhythmGameSelect} notcontains 'Item 44' and {RhythmGameSelect} notcontains 'Item MD'","placeholder":"BanG Dream 365"},{"type":"boolean","name":"RhythmGame Culture","title":{"zh-cn":"您是否了解音游相关亚文化？","default":"Do you know about the subculture related to rhythm games?"},"description":{"zh-cn":"例如音乐游戏选曲、谱面制作、相关系统判定机制 (音乐游戏的制作)、音乐游戏视频等等音游相关要素及其衍生物。","default":"For example, music game song selection, chart creation, related system judgment mechanisms (production of music games), music game videos, and other elements related to music games and their derivatives."},"isRequired":true},{"type":"boolean","name":"RhythmGameActivities","title":{"zh-cn":"您是否参与音游圈相关活动？","default":"Do you participate in activities related to rhythm games?"},"description":{"zh-cn":"参与/关注 音游圈相关比赛或活动 (如BOF、OWC...)。
参与指广义上的参与，包括但不限于 参赛、评分、讨论...","default":"Participate in/follow music game-related competitions or events (such as BOF, OWC...).
Participation refers to a broad sense of involvement, including but not limited to competing, judging, discussing..."},"isRequired":true}]},{"name":"3","title":{"zh-cn":"Part 3 | 成员素质保证测试","default":"Part 3 | Member Quality Assurance Test"},"description":{"zh-cn":"| 填写下方内容相当于温习了一遍《管理公约》，请仔细确认避免踩雷哦！","default":"| Filling out the content below is equivalent to reviewing the "管理公约" . Please confirm carefully to avoid any pitfalls!"},"elements":[{"type":"boolean","name":"SelfPlayed","title":{"zh-cn":"您是否能保证您未来以及过去公布的所有本人音游成绩真实有效，且为本人亲自游玩？","default":"Can you guarantee that all of my rhythm game scores published in the future and in the past are authentic and valid, and that I played them personally?"},"isRequired":true},{"type":"boolean","name":"StudentInLT","title":{"zh-cn":"您是否能保证您目前或曾经为福建省厦门第六中学 (同安校区) 的学生？","default":"Can you guarantee that you are currently or have ever been a student at No.6 High School of Xiamen, Fujian (Tong'an Campus)?"},"description":{"zh-cn":"如果您不是福建省厦门第六中学 (同安校区) 的学生，请不要使用本问卷加入。
如您为部内成员邀请的外校学生，请让TA们查看群内有关公告或联系管理员。","default":"If you are not a student of No.6 High School of Xiamen, Fujian (Tong'an Campus), please do not use this questionnaire to join.
If you are an external student invited by a member of the department, please have them check the announcements in the group or contact the administrator."},"isRequired":true},{"type":"boolean","name":"Harmonious","title":{"zh-cn":"您是否能做到在本音游部内交流时保持和谐、包容的语气，不歧视、不排挤某类音游或音游玩家群体？","default":"Can you maintain a harmonious and inclusive tone when communicating within this rhythm game community, without discriminating against or excluding any particular type of rhythm game or player group?"},"isRequired":true},{"type":"boolean","name":"NoESU","title":{"zh-cn":"您是否能做到加入本音游部后，不在群内发表小鬼、钓鱼、跳脸、恶俗等言论？","default":"Can you refrain from making comments such as trolling or vulgarity in the group after joining our gaming club?"},"description":{"zh-cn":"抽象言论看情况，但不得过激或造成大多数群员的不满。","default":"Some of statements should be made with caution, but must not be overly radical or cause dissatisfaction among the majority of group members."},"isRequired":true},{"type":"boolean","name":"NoNSFW","title":{"zh-cn":"您是否能做到加入本音游部后，不发表(与音游无关的)色情、敏感等违法违规、NSFW 信息？","default":"Can you commit to not posting any illegal, sensitive, or NSFW content (unrelated to rhythm games) after joining our rhythm game group?"},"description":{"zh-cn":"后续有可能会开辟渠道。但是不准在QQ/微信里聊这些！！","default":"There may be a possibility of opening channels in the future. But do not discuss these in QQ/WeChat!!"},"isRequired":true},{"type":"boolean","name":"FollowAdmin","title":{"zh-cn":"您是否能保证加入本音游部之后，遵守《福建省厦门第六中学(同安校区)音游部 管理公约》等后续相关规定？","default":"Can you guarantee that after joining the music game department, you will comply with the "福建省厦门第六中学(同安校区)音游部 管理公约" and other subsequent related regulations?"},"isRequired":true}]},{"name":"page1","title":{"zh-cn":"Part 4 | 信息确认与提交","default":"Part 4 | Information Confirmation and Submission"},"elements":[{"type":"radiogroup","name":"CheckInfo","title":{"zh-cn":"请认真确认以上信息全部真实有效，填写正确！","default":"Please carefully confirm that all the above information is true and valid, and fill it out correctly!"},"description":{"zh-cn":"提交本问卷后不可更改。

提交后请耐心等待审核 (如有急需可以私聊群主/管理)，请勿重复提交！！","default":"Once this questionnaire is submitted, it cannot be changed.

Please be patient while waiting for the review after submission (if urgent, you can privately message the group owner/administrator). Please do not submit multiple times!!"},"isRequired":true,"choices":[{"value":"Item 3","text":{"zh-cn":"我已确认","default":"I have confirmed"}}]}]}],"triggers":[{"type":"complete","expression":"{Policy} = false"}],"cookieName":"XMLZTAXQYYB-ENTRANCESURVEY","headerView":"advanced"}
